/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by a variety of buildings and trees, their green foliage contrasting with the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street scene.
